column1: A service to honor the life of Mr. Graybeal will be conducted on Tuesday
column3: 2015 at 8:00 PM in the Bluff City Chapel of Tetrick Funeral Home with Pastor Rodney Fields officiating. The family will receive friends in the funeral home chapel from 6:00 ï¿½ 8:00 PM on Tuesday prior to the service
